activity.text: > > * When I type something on width and height, it auto-closes suddenly, and the pop-up is not working properly Hello @nihal467 , Could you please guide me on how to access the popup for editing details? I'm looking to understand how to address the issue. Thank you!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5088
activity.text:
Hello @rithviknishad ,

I'm pleased to inform you that I've successfully resolved both of the mentioned issues:

- [x] The pop-up now remains appropriately positioned as the page is scrolled.
- [x] The pop-up is designed to close when clicking outside of it.

Could you kindly review the pull request at your earliest convenience?

Thank you!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6169
activity.text: fixed popup scrolling and closing problem

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5088
activity.text:
Hey @rithviknishad
I hope this message finds you well. I've been diligently working on the project and I'm excited to update you on the progress I've made so far:
- [ x] Resolved the issue where the pop-up doesn't close when clicked outside.

With this done, I'm now moving on to tackle the next challenge: addressing the scroll-along-with-page problem. I'm confident I can make headway on this front as well.

Could you kindly assign this task to me?

open_prs.title: fixed popup scrolling and closing problem
